name: Chaos Butterfly
description:
Short proof of concept for a butterfly game made with Unity as part of the Game Design & Development class on Coursera. I modified each of the sprites and sounds to fit a more nature-oriented theme. 

Additional gameplay modifications and designs TBD - suggestions, ideas, and collaborators welcome!

--

Special thanks to Elthen's Pixel Art for the spider sprites: https://elthen.itch.io/
